original_text: All the leaders of the priests and the people also turned away from the Lord more and more. They did the same disgusting sins that the people in other nations did. They made the Lord's temple an unclean place. That was the place that the Lord himself had chosen as his special home in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 모든 제사장들의 우두머리들과 백성도 크게 범죄하여 이방 모든 가증한 일을 따라서 여호와께서 예루살렘에 거룩하게 두신 그의 전을 더럽게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: All the leaders of the priests and the people
also turned away from the Lord more and more.
They did the same disgusting sins
that the people in other nations did.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 민족 사람들이 하던 것과 같은 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They made the Lord's temple an unclean place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여호와의 성전을 부정한 곳으로 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: that the Lord himself had chosen as his special home
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와께서 자신의 특별한 거처로 선택하신 곳
